summary: Generated 4 recommendations based on test results.

recommendations.title: All Tests Passing
recommendations.description: Excellent! All 380 tests passed successfully across 10 iterations.
recommendations.action: Continue monitoring and maintain current quality standards.

recommendations.title: Security Hardening
recommendations.description: Authentication tests passed but consider additional security measures.
recommendations.action: Implement rate limiting, CSRF protection, and password hashing.

recommendations.title: Mobile Experience Enhancement
recommendations.description: Mobile tests all passed. Consider additional mobile-specific features.
recommendations.action: Add PWA features, offline support, and mobile-specific gestures.

recommendations.title: Feature Enhancements
recommendations.description: Core functionality is solid. Consider advanced features.
recommendations.action: Add event analytics, bulk operations, and advanced reporting.
